Translations.Text: Eteke aji iyata tara kono antaranga bandhu nathakiba
Arau ksata-nihsrta pumjara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
yito aparaadhisakalara bahirae ana kone'o nakhaba
Eteke ma'i sapata karao se'ibora bastura yibora tomaloke dekha poraa
arau tarao sapata karao yibora tomaloke dekha noporaa
niscaya eya (kora'ana) eka sanmanita raachulara (bahita) bani
Arau eya kono kabira katha nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama imana posana karaa
Arau eya kono ganakara katha'o nahaya; tomaloke khube'i kama upadesa grahana karaa
Eya bisbajagatara pratipalakara taraphara paraa nayilakrta
Yadi te'om amara namata kono micha racana karailehemtena
tente niscaya ami taka som haterae dharailohemtena
tara pichata ami tara hrdapindara siraa kati dilohemtena
eteke tomalokara majata ene kono na'i, yiye taka raksa karaiba
Arau eya (kora'ana) to muttakbisakalara babe niscita eta upadesa
Arau ami niscaya jano ye, tomalokara majata kichumana mithyaraopakarai ache
Arau e'ito (kora'ana) niscaya kaphirasakalara babe eka niscita anusocanara karana
Arau niscaya e'ito suniscita satya
Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namata tachabiha patha karaa
Byakti ejane abedana karaile, ene sasti samparke yito apatita haâ€™ba
kaphirasakalara oparata, yara kono pratiraodhakarai na'i
E'ito ahiba allahara taraphara paraa, yijana urdhbaraohanara khatakhatiborara (jakhala) adhikarai
phiraistasakala arau rauha ene eta dinata allahara dise urd'dhagami haya, yara paraimana pancasa hajara bachara
Eteke tumi dhairya dharana karaa parama dhairya
Sihamte e'i dinaka bahu durata thaka buli bharae
Arau ami iyaka nice'i ocarata dekhi acho
Se'idina akasa hai yaba galita dhatura darae
arau parbatasamuha hai yaba rana-biranara unara darae
arau kono antaranga bandhurae antaranga bandhura kha-khabara nusudhiba
